firstBlock.onlineTrainingSubtitle: It is possible to training using a web or mobile application.
firstBlock.mobileText1: You might think it's just like any other account creation... long, tedious, and full of endless fields to fill out. But it's not.
firstBlock.mobileText2: We have designed the entire process to be the easiest and shortest ever conceived for a personal account. Download the app and see for yourself!

secondBlock.title: What is Gymby?
secondBlock.subtitle: Take your interaction with your trainer to the next level. Receive your trainer's workout program in your personal calendar, track your progress together, monitor your statistics and take body measurements. Create your dream body now!

firstBlock.title: Free training program
firstBlock.point1: Choose a workout program from 20+ free programs created by experts and import it into your personal training calendar;
firstBlock.point2: Each program will allow you to improve your body based on an already created and thoughtful training schedule;
firstBlock.point3: All programs are designed for people with different capabilities and goals. So, you can choose the program that will be perfect for you.

secondBlock.title: Program with a personal trainer
secondBlock.point1: Choose your personal trainer and start creating your ideal body under the supervision of a professional;
secondBlock.point2: Trainers can post their own paid training programs or create them personally for you;
secondBlock.point3: With your consent, the trainer can make corrections to your training calendar;
secondBlock.point4: For the most beneficial and safe training, a session with a trainer will be the most effective choice.

thirdBlock.title: Personal training program
thirdBlock.point1: Create your own training plan and train more efficiently;
thirdBlock.point2: This feature will allow you to create a personalized workout plan that will allow you to train your body at the most convenient time for you;
thirdBlock.point3: Creating a personal program does not take much time and allows you to conveniently combine training with all your daily activities.

fourthBlock.title: Do you want to become a coach and have the necessary education?

mainContent.title: Coaching capabilities:
mainContent.point1: The ability to create your own paid training programs and put them on the general list of programs;
mainContent.point2: Creating a workout individually for a client;
mainContent.point3: Interaction with the student's training calendar;
mainContent.point5: Tracking the progress of your clients.
mainContent.subscriptionRegistration: You can subscribe in your personal account.
